column6:
With the Mighty Avengers' Wonder Man continuing his efforts to rehabilitate Lady Killer, has she really taken to her new role as a hero? Or is there still more anger behind those eyes? Wonder Man puts his faith to the test as the end of his gentleman's bet draws near!,2007,3
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Andrew Currie | writer:Peter David | inker:Andrew Hennessy | letterer:Dave Lanphear | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
